Key Match Events: The match ended in a 0-0 draw, with no goals scored by either team.
Pre-Game Insights: This was Sunil Chhetri’s final game in international colors.
Post-Match Reflections: This also means India’s hopes of advancing to the third round of the FIFA World Cup Qualifiers look slim.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the fifth round of Group A in the FIFA World Cup 2026 qualifiers.
Others: Kuwait needs to beat Afghanistan to ensure qualification, and a win or draw by Qatar against India would also favor Kuwait’s chances.
